subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte won his 171st game as a Yankee Tuesday, moving him into fourth place on the team’s career victory list, as New York blitzed the Padres in the Bronx.
snippet: Andy Pettitte won his 171st game as a Yankee Tuesday, moving him into fourth place on the team’s career victory list, as New York blitzed the Padres in the Bronx.
